text.section:
In addition to any other deductions allowed under this subtitle, an inmate may be allowed a deduction of 5 days from the inmate's term of confinement for each calendar month during which the inmate manifests satisfactory progress in:
vocational courses; or
other educational and training courses.

The deduction described in subsection (a) of this section shall be calculated:
from the first day that the inmate participates in the course; and
on a prorated basis for any portion of the calendar month during which the inmate participates in the course.
